00023 #ifndef _EEPROM_H
00024 #define _EEPROM_H
00025 
00026 // \cond
00027 /******************************************************************************
00028                    Includes section
00029 ******************************************************************************/
00030 #include <sysTypes.h>
00031 
00032 /******************************************************************************
00033                    Define(s) section
00034 ******************************************************************************/
00035 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00036   #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE 0x400u
00037 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) \
00038    || defined(ATXMEGA256A3) || defined(ATXMEGA256D3) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1) || defined(AT91SAM3S4C) \
00039    || defined(AT91SAM4S16C)
00040   #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE 0x1000u
00041 #elif defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00042    #if defined(HAL_USE_EEPROM_EMULATION)
00043       #if defined(HAL_2K)
00044         #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE (2 * 1024)  // 2 KB
00045       #else // defined(HAL_4K)
00046         #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE (4 * 1024) // 4KB
00047       #endif
00048    #else //! defined (HAL_USE_EEPROM_EMULATION)
00049      #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE (4 * 1024) // 4KB
00050    #endif
00051 #elif defined(ATMEGA256RFR2) || defined(ATMEGA2564RFR2)
00052   #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE 0x2000u
00053 #elif defined(ATXMEGA128A1) || defined(ATXMEGA128B1)
00054   #define EEPROM_DATA_MEMORY_SIZE 0x800u
00055 #endif
00056 // \endcond
00057 
00058 /******************************************************************************
00059                    Types section
00060 ******************************************************************************/
00061 /**************************************************************************/
00064 typedef struct
00065 {
00067   uint16_t address;
00069   uint8_t *data;
00071   uint16_t length;
00072 } HAL_EepromParams_t;
00073 
00074 /******************************************************************************
00075                    Prototypes section
00076 ******************************************************************************/
00077 /******************************************************************************
00078 \brief Reads a number of bytes defined by HAL_EepromParams_t from the EEPROM.
00079 \param[in]
00080   param - address of HAL_EepromParams_t structure. \n
00081   fields of structure set by user: \n
00082   address - eeprom address \n
00083   data - pointer to data memory \n
00084   length - number of bytes
00085 \param[in]
00086   readDone - pointer to the function that will notify about reading completion;
00087              can be set to NULL
00088 \return
00089   0 - success, \n
00090   -1 - the number of bytes to read is too large, \n
00091   -2 - the previous EEPROM request is not completed yet.
00092 ******************************************************************************/
00093 int HAL_ReadEeprom(HAL_EepromParams_t *params, void (*readDone)());
00094 
00095 /******************************************************************************
00096 \brief Writes a number of bytes defined by HAL_EepromParams_t to EEPROM.
00097 By writeDone parameter user can control if write operation will be asynchronous
00098 or synchronous.
00099 \param[in]
00100   param - address of HAL_EepromParams_t structure. \n
00101   fields of structure set by user: \n
00102   address - eeprom address \n
00103   data - pointer to data memory \n
00104   length - number of bytes
00105 \param[in]
00106   writeDone - pointer to the function that will notify about writing completion;
00107               can be set to NULL \n
00108   Only for avr: \n
00109   if writeDone is NULL write operation will be synchronous.
00110 \return
00111   0 - success, \n
00112   -1 - the number of bytes to write is too large, \n
00113   -2 - the previous EEPROM request is not completed yet.
00114 ******************************************************************************/
00115 int HAL_WriteEeprom(HAL_EepromParams_t *params, void (*writeDone)());
00116 
00117 /**************************************************************************/
00124 bool HAL_IsEepromBusy(void);
00125 
00126 /**************************************************************************/
00129 void HAL_StopWriteToEeprom(void);
00130 
00131 #endif /*_EEPROM_H*/
